name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2000
overview: Jikkyō Powerful Pro Yakyū 2000 is a baseball game developed by Diamond Head and published by Konami. It is part of the Jikkyō Powerful Pro Yakyū series and fourth entry for the Nintendo 64. This version is compatible with “PowerPro Kun Pocket 2” for the Game Boy Color via the transfer pak.
